rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Naturally lit entrance with Vastu alignment to the east. Incorporates Bohemian design elements like colorful tiles and vintage decor.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-concept living space featuring eclectic furnishings, warm lighting, and exposed beams. Large windows on the south to invite sunlight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet Bohemian kitchen with vintage elements. Positioned in the northeast corner for Vastu auspiciousness. Features an island counter and pendant lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, a flexible dining space with mismatched Bohemian decor and natural wooden finishes.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Triplex style studio apartment designed as a multipurpose space with hidden storage, convertible furniture, and soft Bohemian textiles. North facing to ensure calm energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom near the kitchen for convenience, with eco-friendly fixtures and a Vastu-compliant layout in the northwest corner.

openings.description: Wooden door crafted in vintage style with intricate patterns.
Large casement windows facilitating natural light and ventilation. Placed according to Vastu guidelines on the south wall.
Smaller window designed for task lighting and providing a view of the garden.
North-facing window ensuring calm energy in line with Vastu principles.
Balcony providing direct access to the large garden space, enhancing natural ventilation and connection to nature.
